questions.question: Which verb is used to add a PDF to an email?
questions.explanation: You 'attach' files to an email when you want to send them as part of the message.

questions.question: Please ________ (no) delete the meeting notes.
questions.explanation: We use 'don't' to form a negative imperative in English.

questions.question: Match the email verbs with their functions:
Choose the correct polite instruction:
questions.explanation: 'Please' + base verb is the most common and professional way to give polite instructions.

questions.question: ________ (Cierra) all programs before logging out.
questions.explanation: 'Close' is the correct imperative form for 'Cerrar'.

questions.question: What does 'Forward' (FW) mean?
options: To send the message to another person.
questions.explanation: Forwarding is sending a message you received to someone else.

questions.question: ________ (Envía) the email to the manager. (Imperative)
questions.explanation: 'Send' is the base form of the verb used for instructions.

questions.question: Which of these is a negative instruction?
questions.explanation: We use 'Don't' + base verb for negative instructions.

questions.question: Match the Spanish to English administrative verbs:
What is the meaning of 'Reply'?
Please ________ (revisa) the spreadsheet for errors.
questions.explanation: 'Check' is the verb used for 'revisar' or 'verificar'.

questions.question: If you want to keep an email but remove it from your inbox, you should:
questions.explanation: Archiving saves the email for later while keeping your inbox clean.

questions.question: ________ (Guarda) your work before you close the program.
Which action removes an email permanently?
questions.explanation: 'Delete' removes the message from your records.

questions.question: Please ________ (no abras) suspicious attachments.
How do you make the instruction 'Print the document' more polite?
questions.explanation: Adding 'Please' at the beginning is the standard professional way to soften an instruction.

questions.question: Match the phrasal verbs with their meanings:
What follows 'Don't' in a negative instruction?
options: The base form of the verb
questions.explanation: Negative imperatives use 'Don't' + base verb (e.g., Don't send).

questions.question: Please ________ (reenvía) this email to the HR department.
In an office, 'Inbox' refers to:
options: The folder for new incoming messages.
questions.explanation: The 'Inbox' is where all your new incoming emails arrive.
